name: Purrfect Apawcalypse IF2
description:
Volt and his friends came to visit Hanako-Land, one of the biggest theme parks in Kemono Town! But what's waiting for them there...monster balloons, blood demons, and a vicious terrorist?!

Can they escape from the hellish amusement park? And what is the terrorist's true purpose?!

This game is the PA series Fan-game!! Play the origin-series here! AND Play the IF-series first game here!

This game  is an apocalyptic dog dating dog your own dogventure fiction game. Trigger warnings include cartoon gore, bifurcated dogs, headless dogs, generally dogs not having a great time. Play at your own discretion!  Almost music, Art and programming by Rawfish, Some music by 90%studios. created using Renpy!
